TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputFile extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputFile Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type HtmlInputFile = class inherit HtmlInputControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用服务器控件处理从浏览器客户端向服务器上传二进制文件或文本文件的内容。Use the server control to handle uploading binary or text files from a browser client to the server. 文件上传适用于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本3.02 或更高版本。File upload works with Microsoft Internet Explorer version 3.02 or later. > [!NOTE] > 控件设计为仅用于回发方案, 而不是在部分页面呈现期间在异步回发方案中使用。The control is designed to be used only in postback scenarios and not in asynchronous postback scenarios during partial-page rendering. 在 控件内使用控件时, 必须使用作为面板对象的控件来上载该文件。When you use a control inside an control, the file must be uploaded by using a control that is a object for the panel. 控件用于更新页面的选定区域, 而不是使用回发来更新整个页面。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[部分页呈现概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 若要指定要上传的文件, 请在控件文本框中输入该文件的完整路径 (例如, "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt")。To specify the file to upload, enter the full path to the file (for example, "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt") in the text box of the control. 还可以通过单击 "**浏览**" 按钮, 然后在 "**选择文件**" 对话框中找到该文件, 来选择该文件。You can also select the file by clicking the **Browse** button and then locating it in the **Choose file** dialog box. > [!NOTE] > 要使此控件正常工作, 必须将控件的属性设置为 "多部分/窗体数据"。The property of an control must be set to "multipart/form-data" for this control to work properly. 控件没有用于回发到服务器的内置方法。The control does not have a built-in way to post back to the server. 若要将文件上传到服务器, 请使用属性中包含的对象的方法。To upload the file to the server, use the method of the object contained in the property. 通常在事件处理方法 (如按钮单击) 中完成此操作。This operation is usually done in an event-handling method, such as for a button click. > [!NOTE] > 使用 类的方法时, 请确保指定根路径 (例如 "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt")。When you use the method of the class, make sure to specify a rooted path (for example, "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt"). 可在具有`requireRootedSaveAsPath`属性的[httpRuntime 元素 (ASP.NET 设置架构)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)配置节中指定方法的行为。The behavior of the method can be specified in the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) configuration section with the `requireRootedSaveAsPath` attribute. 此特性的默认值为 `true`。The default value of this attribute is `true`. 如果将此属性设置为`false`, 则在指定路径时使用方法将尝试将文件`systemroot`放在 \system32\inetsrv 目录中。If you set this attribute to `false`, then using the method with no path specified will attempt to place the file in the `systemroot` \system32\inetsrv directory. 默认情况下, 此目录是写保护的;因此, 该文件不能保存在此处。By default, this directory is write-protected; therefore, the file can not be saved there. 请确保为 ASP.NET 使用的帐户提供对要存储该文件的目录的写权限。Make sure to provide write permission for the account used by ASP.NET for the directory where you want to store the file. 上传大型文件时, 使用`maxRequestLength` [httpRuntime 元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)元素的属性可增加允许的最大文件大小。When uploading large files, use the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) element to increase the maximum allowable file size. 当文件超过指定的大小时, 将在浏览器中生成 DNS 错误。A DNS error is generated in the browser when the file exceeds the specified size. 上传大型文件时, 可能还会收到以下错误消息:You might also receive the following error message when uploading large files: aspnet_wp.exe (PID:1520) 被回收, 因为内存消耗超出 460 MB (60% 的可用 RAM)。aspnet_wp.exe (PID: 1520) was recycled because memory consumption exceeded 460 MB (60 percent of available RAM). 如果遇到此错误消息, 请增加 machine.config 文件的`memoryLimit` [processModel 元素 (ASP.NET 设置架构)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b8fe20e-74c8-4566-b72c-ce5f83c8e32d)元素中的属性值。If you encounter this error message, increase the value of the `memoryLimit` attribute in the [processModel Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b8fe20e-74c8-4566-b72c-ce5f83c8e32d) element of the Machine.config file. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表, 请参见构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来创建简单的文件上传方案。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a simple file upload scenario. 要使此示例正常工作, 需要在计算机的驱动器 C 上`Temp`创建一个名为的目录。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"File" 文本字符串。The "file" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 类的新实例。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class. 要使此示例正常工作, 需要在计算机的驱动器 C 上`Temp`创建一个名为的目录。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputFileCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileCtor/CS/htmlinputfilectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputFileCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileCtor/VB/htmlinputfilectorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用逗号分隔的 MIME 编码列表，该列表用于约束用户可以选择的文件类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of MIME encodings used to constrain the file types the user can select.

value.span: 用逗号分隔的 MIME 编码列表。

span.span: The comma-separated list of MIME encodings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定可上载到服务器的文件类型。Use this property to specify the file type that can be uploaded to the server. 例如, 若要将所选内容限制为图像, 请将此属性设置为 "image/\*"。For example, to restrict the selection to images, set this property to "image/\*". > [!NOTE] > 对此属性的支持取决于浏览器。Support for this property is browser-dependent. 检查浏览器以确定它是否支持此属性。Check your browser to determine whether it supports this property. 建议使用服务器端代码, 以确保该文件属于预期类型。It is recommended that you use server-side code to ensure that the file is of the expected type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来限制用户选择除图像文件之外的任何文件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to restrict the user from selecting any file other than an image file. 要使此示例正常工作, 需要在计算机的驱动器 C 上`Temp`创建一个名为的目录。因为对属性的支持与浏览器相关, 所以会执行服务器端检查以确保仅上载映像。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. Because support for the property is browser-dependent, a server-side check is performed to ensure that only images are uploaded. 如果上载的文件无法读取为类型, 则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if the uploaded file can not be read as an type. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

This method always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件实现接口, 该接口具有两种方法: 和。 The control implements the interface, which has two methods: and . 方法由方法调用`false`并始终返回, 指示控件的状态不由 ASP.NET 页框架管理。 The method is called by the method and always returns `false`, indicating that the control's state is not managed by the ASP.NET page framework. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能。 The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置从客户机上载的文件的文件路径的最大长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum length of the file path for the file to upload from the client computer.
The maximum length of the file path.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示还未设置该属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that the property has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可为要上传的文件的路径指定可以输入的字符数的限制。Use this property to specify a limit for the number of characters that can be entered for the path to the file to upload. > [!NOTE] > 对此属性的支持取决于浏览器。Support for this property is browser-dependent. 检查浏览器以确定它是否支持此属性。Check your browser to determine whether it supports this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有为网页的控件指定编码, 则属性将设置为 "多部分/窗体数据"。If no encoding is specified for the Web page's control, the property is set to "multipart/form-data". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法, 以便`Title`始终将特性添加到每个自定义控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that a `Title` attribute is always added to each custom control. 要使此示例正常工作, 需要在计算机的驱动器 C 上`Temp`创建一个名为的目录。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputfile_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputfile_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputfile_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputfile_onprerender.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取对由客户端指定的上载文件的访问。

span.span: Gets access to the uploaded file specified by a client.
A that accesses the file to be uploaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 浏览器安全限制阻止跨多个请求维护此值。Browser security restrictions prevent this value from being maintained across multiple requests. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性启动将文件传输到服务器的实用工具。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to initiate the utility that transfers the file to the server. 请注意, 如果上载文件的大小 (以字节为单位) 超过了属性的值, 则不会上传该文件。Note that if the size of the uploaded file in bytes exceeds the value of the property, the file is not uploaded. 要使此示例正常工作, 需要在计算机的驱动器 C 上`Temp`创建一个名为的目录。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取客户机上文件的完整路径。

span.span: Gets the full path of the file on the client's computer.

value.span: 客户端文件的完整路径。

span.span: The full path of the client's file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索客户端计算机上文件的完整路径 (例如 "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt")。The property retrieves the full path of the file on the client's computer (for example "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt"). 当你需要知道文件在提交文件的计算机上的存储位置时, 此方法非常有用。This is useful when you need to know where the file is stored on the computer submitting the file. 此属性通常还用于确定原始文件名。This property is also commonly used to determine the original file name. 若要获取原始文件名, 请分析此属性的值。To get the original file name, parse the value of this property. > [!NOTE] > 属性为只读。The property is read-only. 如果尝试为此属性赋值, 则会引发。If you attempt to assign a value to this property, a is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性在客户端计算机上显示文件的完整路径。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the full path of the file on the client's computer. 要使此示例正常工作, 需要在计算机的驱动器 C 上`Temp`创建一个名为的目录。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputFileValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileValue/CS/htmlinputfilevaluecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputFileValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileValue/VB/htmlinputfilevaluevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An attempt was made to assign a value to this property.
